name: Defender (itch) (horacehylee)
description:
Defender
Defend and survive for 60s
Source Code: https://github.com/horacehylee/wgj148-defender

Made for Weekly Game Jam 
Theme: Mirror

Controls:
Click and drag the paddle
Bullet will be reflected by same color paddle
Enemy can be killed with same color bullet
Bullet will also bounce off walls, so be careful!
